segments.text: Hi . What can I get for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d like a half a pound of ground beef , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good choice ! Our ground beef is extra lean , if you know what I mean .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could I also have half a dozen pork chops and two pounds of boneless chicken breasts ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , no no no chicken breasts at the moment , but we have some nice chicken thighs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , that won ’ t do . I ’ ll take this smoked ham you have here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is this salami and bologna you have here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes ! It ’ s very fine meat ! Made it myself ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds good . Okay , that ’ s it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait ! We have T-bone , rib eye , and sirloin steaks . They are very fresh ! Just came from the slaughter house ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mmm ... No that ’ s okay , really . I think that ’ s all for today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . That will be thirty-four dollars and fifty cents .
segments.speaker: S1
